original: @#// rje sgam po pa'i zhal gdams bla sgrub kyi dbang chog smin byed nyi ma'i 'od phreng bzhugs //
analyzed: rje sgam po ba zhal doms bla sgrub kyi dbang chog smin byed nyi ma d phreng bzhugs

original: rab 'byams rgyal ba kun gyi dngos //
analyzed: rab byam rgyal ba kun gyi dngos

original: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad la //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma zhabs pad la

original: btud nas gang gi smin byed dbang //
analyzed: dud nas gang gi smin byed dbang

original: skal bzang dga' ston nyid du spro //
analyzed: skal bzang dga ston nyid du spro

original: de la 'dir rje sgam po pa'i gsang lam bla ma sgrub pa'i dbang bskur gyi rim pa bya bar 'dod na dam tshhig la gnas shing bsnyen sgrub tshhul bzhin bgyid pa'i slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor /
analyzed: de la dir rje sgam po ba gsang lam bla ma sgrub ba dbang skur gyi rim ba byed ba dod na dam tshhig la gnas shing snyen sgrub tshhul bzhin bgyid ba slob mas gsol ba debs ba ngor

original: dbang gdams ngag legs par thob cing nyams len sngon du song ba'i bla mas /
analyzed: dbang doms ngag legs ba thob cing nyams len sngon du gro ba bla mas

original: dben pa'i gnas su stegs bu'i khar sin+d+hu ra'i man+dal chos 'byung bsnol ma'am /
analyzed: dben ba gnas su stegs bu khar sin+d+hu ra man+dal chos byung snol ma

original: rgyas par pad 'dab bzhi'i dbus su bam/
analyzed: rgya ba pad dab bzhi dbus su

original: chos 'byung gi mthar om gsum ma'i sngags kyis bskor ba /
analyzed: chos byung gi mthar om gsum ma sngags kyis skor ba

original: rin po che'i bum par chu gtshang la bum rdzas so lnga btab pa mgul chings dmar po kha rgyan dung chos gzungs rdor dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rin po che bum ba chu gtshang la bum rdzas so lnga debs ba mgul ching dmar po kha rgyan dung chos gzungs rdar dang cha ba

original: ka pa lar myos byed gtshang ma la bdud rtshi ril bu btab pa /
analyzed: ka ba lar myos byed gtshang ma la bdud rtshi ril bu debs ba

original: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gter bdag gi gtor ma tshhogs dang mchod pa'i yo byad tshhul bzhin du bsham /
analyzed: bla ma yi dam mkha gro gter bdag gi thor ma tshhogs dang mchod ba yo byad tshhul bzhin du bsham

original: slob dpon gyi mdun du rdo rje dril bu da ma ru dang bsang chu me tog gi snod sogs 'du bgyis te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi mdun du rdo rje dril bu da ma ru dang bsang chu me tog gi snod sogs du bgyid te

original: gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas sngon 'gro gtor ma bsngo /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba sgo nas sngon gro thor ma sngo

original: tshhogs gsag nas bzung lha dang bla ma dbyer med du bsgoms nas yid bzlas bya ba'i bar sgrub thabs nas byung ba bzhin bdag bskyed bsgrubs la /
analyzed: tshhogs gsag nas bzung lha dang bla ma dbyer med du sgom nas yid bzlas byed ba ba sgrub thabs nas byung ba bzhin bdag skyed sgrub la

original: bum pa dang mdun bskyed kyi sin+d+hu ra'i dal so sor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bskyed chog dang bzlas pa nan tan bya /
analyzed: bum ba dang mdun skyed kyi sin+d+hu ra dal so sor rdo rje rnal byor ma skyed chog dang bzlas ba nan tan byed

original: bsang chu'i snod du bdud rtshi 'khyil ba'i sgom bzlas rgyas pa gzhan nas 'byung ba'am bsdu na /
analyzed: bsang chu snod du bdud rtshi khyil ba sgom bzlas rgya ba gzhan nas byung ba sdud na

original: om ahhu~m/ stong pa'i ngang las pad nyi'i steng //
analyzed: om stong ba ngang las pad nyi steng

original: hu~m las khro chen bdud rtshi 'khyil //
analyzed: hu~m las khro chen bdud rtshi khyil

analyzed: ljang sngon be con zhags ba dzin

original: khro bo'i chas ldan thugs srog las //
analyzed: khro bo cha ldan thugs srog las

original: 'od 'phros ye shes spyan drangs bstim //
analyzed: d phro ye shes spyan drangs stim

original: dzahhu~m bam hoh ar+g+ham sogs /
analyzed: dzahhu~m bam hoh ar+g+ham sogs

original: rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje ni //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje ni

original: 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i skur ston pa /
analyzed: jigs byed jigs ba skur ston ba

analyzed: khro bo rgyal la phyag tshhal bstod

original: bgegs zhi dngos grub bstshal du gsol //
analyzed: bgegs zhi dngos grub bstshal du gsol

analyzed: om ahbig+h+nan+ta kr-ita hu~m

original: ces ci nus bzla /
analyzed: ces ci nus bzla

original: 'od zhu bsang chur ro gcig gyur //
analyzed: d ju bsang chur(d) ro gcig gyur

original: ces mos / slob dpon rang nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang blangs te /
analyzed: ces mos slob dpon rang nyid ting nge dzin gyi dbang blangs te

original: slob ma rnams phyag dang man+dal grub nas bgegs la gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas bskrad de srung 'khor bsgom /
analyzed: slob ma rnams phyag dang man+dal grub nas bgegs la thor ma sngon du gro ba skrod de srung khor bsgom

original: thun mong gi chos bshad spro na ci rigs byas rjes /
analyzed: thun mong gi chos chad spro na ci rigs byed rjes

original: de yang 'o skol gyi ston pa bla na med pa'i bstan pa 'di la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis las don gyi snying po ni phyi ma nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: de yang mang skol gyi ston ba bla na med ba ston ba di la rgyu dang bras bu theg ba gnyis las don gyi snying po ni phyi ma nyid yin zhing

original: de la'ang gdul bya'i dbang gis bya spyod sogs rgyud sde dman pa gnyis dang / rnal 'byor bla med de gong ma gnyis las 'dir rnal 'byor bla na med pa shes rab ma'i rgyud kyi snying po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang skyabs yul kun 'dus yid bzhin nor bu bla ma dbyer med kyi byin rlabs dbang bskur zab mo
analyzed: de la gdul byed dbang gis byed spyod sogs brgyud sde dman ba gnyis dang rnal byor bla med de gong ma gnyis las dir rnal byor bla na med ba shes rab ma brgyud kyi snying po joms ldan da rdo rje rnal byor ma dang skyob yul kun du yid bzhin nor bu bla ma dbyer med kyi byin rlabs dbang skur zab mo

original: ston pa yin zhing /
analyzed: ston ba yin zhing

original: de la'ang dang po yid ches kyi nges pa bskyed phyir brgyud pa'i lo rgyus cung zad cig spro ba'i dbang du bgyi na /
analyzed: de la dang po yid ches kyi nges ba skyed phyir brgyud ba lo rgyus cung zad cig spro ba dbang du bgyid na

original: khyab bdag rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang gis 'og min rdo rje btshun mo'i gsang bar ri rab sum cu rtsha gnyis kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la zab mo'i chos mtha' yas par ston par mdzad la /
analyzed: khyab bdag rgyal ba rdo rje chang gis g min rdo rje btshun mo gsang ba ri rab sum cu rtsha gnyis kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam ba dpa bo dang rnal byor ma rnams la zab mo chos mtha yas ba ston ba mdzad la

original: mi las 'das pa'i grub chen tai lo pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sprul pa gsang sngags snga 'gyur ba'i phyag na rdo rje lta bur gyur pa des sgyu ma'i sku dngos kyis 'og min du byon nas ston pa nyid las chos nod /
analyzed: mi las da ba grub chen tai lo ba de nyid joms ldan da nyid kyi sprul ba gsang sngags snga gyur ba phyag na rdo rje lta bur gyur ba des sgyu ma sku dngos kyis g min du byon nas ston ba nyid las chos nod

original: de dag yan lag drug dang rim pa lnga phyag rgya bzhir bsdus te /
analyzed: de dag yan lag drug dang rim ba lnga phyag rgya bzhir sdud te

original: tai lo nga la mi yi bla ma med //
analyzed: tai lo nga la mi yi bla ma med

original: ces gsungs la /
analyzed: ces gsungs la

original: the tshhom gyi gnas sel phyir bka' babs bzhi'i bla ma bsten tshhul bstan /
analyzed: the tshhom gyi gnas sel phyir bka bab bzhi bla ma sten tshhul ston

original: de la mkhas grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po na ro pas bya dka' ba bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gros mnyes par mdzad pas gdams pa ma lus pa bum pa gang byo'i tshhul du gnang /
analyzed: de la mkhas grub brnyes ba slob dpon chen po na ro ba byed dka ba chu gnyis la sogs ba rim gros mnyes ba mdzad ba doms ba ma lus ba bum ba gang byo tshhul du gnang

original: de la mnga' bdag mar pa lo tsha de nyid kyis rgya gar du lan gsum byon te rje na ro pa nyid yun ring du bsten /
analyzed: de la mnga bdag mar ba lo tsha de nyid kyis rgya gar du lan gsum byon te rje na ro ba nyid yun ring du sten

original: gdams ngag zab dgu thams cad thugs nyams su bzhes nas sgro 'dogs bcad /
analyzed: doms ngag zab dgu thams cad thugs nyams su bzhes nas sgro dogs gcod

original: khyad par gung thang gi mi la bzhad pa rdo rje des mnga' bdag chen po de nyid lus thog nas dka' ba dang du blangs pa'i tshhul mtha' yas pas mnyes par mdzad pa las /
analyzed: khyad ba gung thang gi mi la bzhad ba rdo rje des mnga bdag chen po de nyid lus thogs nas dka ba dang du blangs ba tshhul mtha yas ba mnyes ba mdzad ba las

original: snying po don gyi man ngag phyag rgya chen po dang zab mo snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa khyad par can gnang /
analyzed: snying po don gyi man ngag phyag rgya chen po dang zab mo snyan brgyud kyi doms ba khyad ba can gnang

original: ngo mtshhar rmad du byung zhing thos kyang yid gnong par 'gyur ba'i dka' ba mang po spyad nas sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshhan btshugs /
analyzed: ngo mtshhar rmad du byung zhing thos kyang yid gnong ba gyur ba dka ba mang po spyod nas sgrub ba rgyal mtshhan btshugs

original: rje de'i thugs kyi sras dam par gyur cing rgyal ba'i rgyal tshhab tu gyur pa rje sgam po pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nu zhes bya bar gyur pa na /
analyzed: rje de thugs kyi sras dam ba gyur cing rgyal ba rgyal tshhab tu gyur ba rje sgam po ba de nyid joms ldan da thub ba dbang po khor du byang chub sems dpa zla d gzhon nu zhes byed ba gyur ba na

original: ston pas mdo sde ting 'dzin rgyal po gsungs pa'i dus zhig gi tshhe /
analyzed: ston ba mdo sde ting dzin rgyal po gsungs ba dus jig gi tshhe

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshhogs mang po la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa khor tshhogs mang po la

original: mi bzad pa'i phyi dus dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshhe /
analyzed: mi bzad ba phyi dus dam ba chos jig ba tshhe

original: mdo sde 'di'i don bshad pa dang rgyas par byed pa su zhig yod ces bka' bstshal pa la /
analyzed: mdo sde di don chad ba dang rgya ba byed ba su jig yod ces bka bstshal ba la

original: zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te khas blangs shing dam bcas pa na /
analyzed: zla d gzhon nur gyur ba stan las ldang te khas blangs shing dam cha ba na

original: ston pas de'i spyi bor phyag bzhag cing ma pham pa la sogs pa byang sems kyi 'khor rnams dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag kyang dbang du bkod de /
analyzed: ston ba de spyi bor phyag jog cing ma pham ba la sogs ba byang sems kyi khor rnams dang lha dang cha ba jig rten dag kyang dbang du bkod de

original: ma 'ongs phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rtag tu tshhangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dam pa rgyas par byed pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i chos kyi gter 'byed pa dang / 'khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: ma ngs phyi dus jigs ba chen po la zla d gzhon nur gyur ba rtag tu tshhangs ba spyod ba la gnas ba dang ting nge dzin dam ba rgya ba byed ba dang bde ba gshegs ba chos kyi gter byed ba dang khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba byung ba dang

original: de nas rgyal ba 'od dri med du 'tshhang rgya ba la sogs par lung bstan cing de dag la bar chad mi 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin du chos smra ba brgyad brgya dag kyang langs te sngar bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i don 'dzin par dam bcas pa dang /
analyzed: de nas rgyal ba d dri med du tshhang rgya ba la sogs ba lung ston cing de dag la ba chad mi byung ba byin gyis brlabs ba dang de bzhin du chos smra ba brgyad brgya dag kyang ldang te sngar bzhin du ting nge dzin rgyal po don dzin ba dam cha ba dang

original: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin sogs bye ba brgyad cu la sogs pas kyang skyes bu dam pa de rnams bsrung bar dam bcas pa'i tshhul rnams mdo sde ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por gsungs la /
analyzed: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin sogs bye ba brgyad cu la sogs ba kyang skye bu dam ba de rnams bsrung ba dam cha ba tshhul rnams mdo sde ting nge dzin gyi rgyal por gsungs la

original: yang ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud du dge slong 'tshho byed ces bya ba 'byon pa dang / de la bsngags pa mang po brjod pa dang / des ston pa'i bstan pa yangs shing rgyas par byed par 'gyur zhes kun dga' bo dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: yang ston ba mya ngan las da nas byang phyogs kyi brgyud du dge slong tshho byed ces byed ba byon ba dang de la bsngags ba mang po rjod ba dang des ston ba ston ba yangs shing rgya ba byed ba gyur zhes kun dga bo dbugs byin ba mdzad ba dang

original: de 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag 'od dpag med kyi zhing bde ba can du 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya bar /
analyzed: de chi ba dus byed ma thag d dpog med kyi zhing bde ba can du jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyis rgyan ba zhes byed ba

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med par 'tshhang rgya bar 'gyur ba sogs mdo snying rje pad dkar du bshad pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba d dri ma med ba tshhang rgya ba gyur ba sogs mdo snying rje pad dkar du chad ba dang gzhan yang

original: rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs kha ba can gyi ljongs chu bo ma ha lo hi ta'i klung 'gram ri brag tshhang tshhing can du chos smra ba dge slong 'tshho byed ces bya ba 'khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
analyzed: rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs kha ba can gyi ljongs chu bo ma ha lo hi ta klung grams ri brag tshhang tshhing can du chos smra ba dge slong tshho byed ces byed ba khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs ba ye

original: shes la longs spyod par 'gyur ba sogs dang / thang yig rnams las /
analyzed: shes la longs spyod ba gyur ba sogs dang thang yig rnams las

original: o rgyan nga nyid gnyal smad lha rjer sprul //
analyzed: o rgyan nga nyid gnyal smad lha rjer sprul

original: dwags sgom snying po'i don sgom khyu gcig 'byung //
analyzed: dwags sgom snying po don sgom khyu gcig byung

original: zhes sogs tshhad thub kyi gter lung du ma nas bstan pa dang mthun par rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs na dpal dwags lha sgam po'i gnas ri tshhang tshhing can du /
analyzed: zhes sogs tshhad thub kyi gter lung du ma nas ston ba dang mthun ba rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs na dpal dwags lha sgam po gnas ri tshhang tshhing can du

original: rje sgam po pa dge slong 'tshho byed du grags pa 'khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba dang bcas pa byon te mdo ting 'dzin rgyal po'i dgongs don snying po'i gdams pa phyag rgya chen po nyid thugs nyams su bzhes shing /
analyzed: rje sgam po ba dge slong tshho byed du grags ba khor lnga brgya las mi nyung ba dang cha ba byon te mdo ting dzin rgyal po dgongs don snying po doms ba phyag rgya chen po nyid thugs nyams su bzhes shing

original: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas dam bcas pa'i lung dang mthun par slob ma yang slob brgyud par bcas pas snying po'i bstan pa ches cher spel bar mdzad cing /
analyzed: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa brgyad brgyas dam cha ba lung dang mthun ba slob ma yang slob brgyud ba cha ba snying po ston ba ches cher spel ba mdzad cing

original: 'dzam gling gi yul gru kun tu dpal ldan dwags po'i bka' brgyud ces yongs su grags par gyur la /
analyzed: dzam gling gi yul gru kun tu dpal ldan dwags po bka brgyud ces yongs su grags ba gyur la

original: snyigs ma'i dus 'dir yang tshhe 'di'i zhen chags bskyungs nas 'jigs pa'i dur khrod dang / ri bo'i bya skyibs dang / mi med kyi lung stong dang / dben pa'i bas mtha' la sogs par sgrub pa la rtshe gcig tu gzhol ba yang brgyud pa gzhan las ches mang ba skye bo kun gyi mig lam du babs par gyur pa 'di bzhin yin la /
analyzed: snyigs ma dus dir yang tshhe di zhen chags skyung nas jigs ba dur khrod dang ri bo byed skyibs dang mi med kyi lung stong dang dben ba ba mtha la sogs ba sgrub ba la rtshe gcig tu gzhol ba yang brgyud ba gzhan las ches mang ba skye bo kun gyi mig lam du bab ba gyur ba di bzhin yin la

original: de lta bu'i sku che ba'i yon tan mtshhungs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i mnyam med sgam po pa chen po de nyid kyis snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus ngan gyi 'gro ba rnams la lhag par brtshe bas /
analyzed: de lta bu sku che ba yon tan mtshhungs ba med ba dang ldan ba mnyam med sgam po ba chen po de nyid kyis snyigs ma lnga bdo dus ngan gyi gro ba rnams la lhag ba brtshe ba

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid dpal ldan bla ma dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'byung gnas ye shes da ki dbyer med du sgrub pa'i thabs las can gseng lam btshan thabs su 'tshhang rgya zhing thos pa dang dran pa tsham gyis grol bar byed pa
analyzed: sangs rgya thams cad du ba bdag nyid dpal ldan bla ma dang dkyil khor thams cad kyi byung gnas ye shes da ki dbyer med du sgrub ba thabs las can gseng lam btshan thabs su tshhang rgya zhing thos ba dang dran ba tsham gyis grol ba byed ba

original: zab chos dam pa 'di nyid dang / mthong grol rang byung da ki'i sku brnyan /
analyzed: zab chos dam ba di nyid dang mthong grol rang byung da ki sku rnyan

original: myang grol khyad 'phags dam rdzas phab rgyun /
analyzed: myang grol khyad phag dam rdzas bebs rgyun

original: mthong grol yig chung la sogs pa them rgya smon lam dang bcas te brag sgom zhwa'i mgul du gter du bsdams nas bzhugs su gsol ba /
analyzed: mthong grol yig chung la sogs ba thems rgya smon lam dang cha te brag sgom zhwa mgul du gter du sdom nas bzhugs su gsol ba

original: lung bstan dus babs bzhin skye sgom ye shes rdo rje'i rnam par sprul pa rig 'dzin chen po 'ja' tshhon snying pos gdan drangs te /
analyzed: lung ston dus bab bzhin skye sgom ye shes rdo rje rnam ba sprul ba rig dzin chen po ja tshhon snying pos gdan drangs te

original: smin grol bdud rtshi'i gru char phab pas skal ldan gdul bya'i bsod nams kyi rdzing bu yongs su gang bar gyur la /
analyzed: smin grol bdud rtshi gru char bebs ba skal ldan gdul byed bsod nams kyi rdzing bu yongs su gang ba gyur la

original: rig 'dzin de nyid nas brgyud pa bdun gyi bar du dbang lung man ngag thob pa tsham gyis grol nas phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang la reg 'gyur du gsungs shing /
analyzed: rig dzin de nyid nas brgyud ba bdun gyi ba du dbang lung man ngag thob ba tsham gyis grol nas phyir mi ldog ba go phen la reg gyur du gsungs shing

original: de lta bu'i dbang bskur zab mo zhu bar byed pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshhogs gnyis legs par gsag dgos phyir /
analyzed: de lta bu dbang skur zab mo ju ba byed ba la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshhogs gnyis legs ba gsag dgos phyir

original: khyed rang rnams kyi mdun gyi nam mkhar yid bzhin nor bu bla ma la skyabs yul mtha' dag sprin bzhin gtibs te bzhugs pa'i mos pa dang ldan pas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bdun rnam dag mdzad par zhu /
analyzed: khyed rang rnams kyi mdun gyi nam mkhar yid bzhin nor bu bla ma la skyob yul mtha dag sprin bzhin gtibs te bzhugs ba mos ba dang ldan ba skyob su gro ba dang bdun rnam dag mdzad ba ju

original: sangs rgyas chos tshhogs dang / ji snyed su dag sogs tshhar gcig brjod du bcug
analyzed: sangs rgya chos tshhogs dang ji snyed su dag sogs tshhar gcig rjod du jug

original: /'o de yang rigs kyi bu khyod rnams sngon nas bsod nams kyi tshhogs dang smon lam rnam dag gi mthus deng gsang sngags theg chen gyi chos dang mjal zhing byin rlabs 'jug pa'i yul dang snod du gyur pa'i dus 'dir gtan gyi 'dun ma sgrub pa'i thabs la
analyzed: de yang rigs kyi bu khyod rnams sngon nas bsod nams kyi tshhogs dang smon lam rnam dag gi mthus deng gsang sngags theg chen gyi chos dang mjal zhing byin rlabs jug ba yul dang snod du gyur ba dus dir gtan gyi dun ma sgrub ba thabs la

original: 'bad dgos shing /
analyzed: bad dgos shing

original: de sgrub par byed pa yang bla ma tshhad ldan gyi drin la ltos dgos te /
analyzed: de sgrub ba byed ba yang bla ma tshhad ldan gyi drin la ltos dgos te

original: dper na nyi ma las me 'byung bar 'dod na me shel gyi rten 'brel tshhogs dgos pa'i phyir slob dpon la tha mal mi'i 'du shes spangs te sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus kyi ngo bor thag chod pa'i dad mos kyis kun nas bslangs te gsol ba gdab
analyzed: dper na nyi ma las me byung ba dod na me shel gyi rten brel tshhogs dgos ba phyir slob dpon la tha mal mi du shes spong te sangs rgya thams cad gcig sdud kyi ngo bor thag chod ba dad mos kyis kun nas bslangs te gsol ba gdab

original: pa 'di yi rjes zlos mdzod /
analyzed: ba di yi rjes zlos mdzod

original: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / rje btshun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo mkha' 'gro rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshhal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje dzin ba chen po dang rje btshun rdo rje rnal byor ma dang dpa bo mkha gro rnams dang sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad la phyag tshhal zhing skyob su mchi

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba'i rgyud la /
analyzed: ming di zhes byed ba brgyud la

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes nam mkha' lta bus gang bar mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes nam mkha lta bud gang ba mdzad du gsol

analyzed: smin ba mdzad du gsol

original: yongs su smin par\u0f8e
analyzed: yongs su smin par\u0f8e

original: shin tu smin par\u0f8e
analyzed: shin tu smin par\u0f8e

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes bdud rtshi lta bus gang\u0f8e
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes bdud rtshi lta bud gang\u0f8e

original: nor bu lta bus gang bar\u0f8e
analyzed: nor bu lta bud gang bar\u0f8e

original: lan gsum / de ltar gsol ba btab nas dngos gzhi dbang bskur ba'i rim pa la'ang snang srid thams cad gdod nas rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyag gcig yin yang de nyid ma rtogs pa rnams kyi shes sgrib sbyang phyir snod bcud lhar gsal gdab dgos pas dmigs pa
analyzed: lan gsum de ltar gsol ba debs nas dngos gzhi dbang skur ba rim ba la snang srid thams cad gdod nas rgyal ba ye shes kyi dkyil khor nyag gcig yin yang de nyid ma rtogs ba rnams kyi shes sgrib sbyong phyir snod bcud lhar gsal gdab dgos ba dmigs ba

original: 'di bzhin mdzod /
analyzed: di bzhin mdzod

original: slob ma la bsang chu 'thor zhing /
analyzed: slob ma la bsang chu thor zhing

analyzed: om ahbig+h+nan+ta kr-ita hu~m

original: kyis bsang / swa b+ha was sbyang /
analyzed: kyis bsang swa b+ha was sbyong

original: stong pa'i ngang las ram yam kham brjod pas dngos 'dzin a 'thas kyi nyes skyon thams cad dag
analyzed: stong ba ngang las ram yam kham rjod ba dngos dzin a thas kyi nyes skyon thams cad dag

original: /khyed rang rnams kyi sems nyid skye med bsam brjod dang bral ba las rang mdangs 'gag med cir yang 'char ba snang sems dbyer med kyi ngo bo dus gsum rgyal yum ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dmar gsal me'i mdog can /
analyzed: rang rnams kyi sems nyid skye med bsam rjod dang bral ba las rang mdangs gag med cir yang char ba snang sems dbyer med kyi ngo bo dus gsum rgyal yum ye shes kyi mkha gro ma sku mdog dmar gsal me mdog can

analyzed: dbu skra kham nag gyen du ldang ba dbus su phag zhal rngam la brjid ba

original: phyag gnyis gri gug dang thod khrag 'dzin cing thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang thod rlon gyi do shal 'phyang ba /
analyzed: phyag gnyis gri gug dang thod khrag dzin cing thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang thod rlon gyi do shal phyang ba

analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang dar dpyong dang rin po che rgyan gyis spras ba

analyzed: gru mo na kha t+wam ga dzin cing zhabs g.yas skum g.yon rkyong ba bam ro snying gar gnon te ye shes me dpung rab tu bar ba dbus su bzhugs ba

analyzed: rdo rje rgya grams gyi tshhul du spyi bor bkod ba dang lhan cig

analyzed: bras bu gsung rdo rje longs sku grub ba skal ba dang ldan ba byed

analyzed: sin+d+hu ra me long lte ba jog cing om gsum ma sngags rjod de

original: me long gi dkyil 'khor las dal gnyis pa 'phros lte bar thim pas gtum mo ye shes kyi me sbar bas spyi bo'i ham byang chub kyi sems zhu nas rtsha gnas thams cad du song bas lus thams cad bde bas khyab par bsams la rlung bum pa can
analyzed: me long gi dkyil khor las dal gnyis ba phro lte ba thim ba thum mo ye shes kyi me sbor ba spyi bo ham byang chub kyi sems ju nas rtsha gnas thams cad du gro ba lus thams cad bde ba khyab ba bsams la rlung bum ba can

analyzed: ci rigs shig sgoms mdzod

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa spyod ba blo gros bzhugs

analyzed: de ni ming tsham brda tsham dogs ba tsham

original: de nas me long sin+d+hu ra'i dal gyi lha tshhogs khyed rang rnams kyi spyi bor bkod pa dang lhan cig bdag gis gsol ba btab pa'i mthar lan tshhwa chu la thim pa bzhin du khyed rang rnams dang dbyer med du gyur pa'i mos pa mdzod /

analyzed: sogs nas thun di nyid du skye ba byin gyis brlab tu gsol

analyzed: de nas khyed rang rnams rgyal yum rdo rje rnal byor mar gsal ba thugs kar bla ma rdo rje dzin ba dzam gling grags ba rab byung gi cha lugs zhes ba nas

analyzed: tshhad med bzhi nyams ur ba jig tu gyur

analyzed: sogs nas thun di nyid du skye ba byin gyis brlab tu gsol gyi ba rjes zlos byed du jug

original: /de nas yang lha dang bla ma'i snang cha gsal ba de'i ngang nas om ahhu~m lce mi bskyod pa yid kyis bzlas pa brgya rtsha la sogs par ji ltar 'os pa mdzad par zhu /
analyzed: nas yang lha dang bla ma snang cha gsal ba de ngang nas om ahhu~m lce mi skyod ba yid kyis bzlas ba brgya rtsha la sogs ba ji ltar s ba mdzad ba ju

original: slob mas yid bzlas grub pa dang / slar yang smon lam gdab pa 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
analyzed: slob mas yid bzlas grub ba dang slar yang smon lam gdab ba di rjes zlos mdzod

original: dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag
analyzed: dge ba di yis myur du bdag

original: /'dzam gling grags pa 'grub gyur nas //
analyzed: gling grags ba grub gyur nas

analyzed: sogs byed de dag gis zab mo dbang gi sngon gro dang dngos gzhi rim ba rnams legs ba grub nas rjes kyi byed ba la

original: spyir gsang sngags kyi dam tshhig spyi dang bye brag gi tshhul rnams nyams pa med par bsrung bar bgyid dgos la /
analyzed: spyir gsang sngags kyi dam tshhig spyi dang bye brag gi tshhul rnams nyams ba med ba bsrung ba bgyid dgos la

original: lhag par lam zab mo'i tshhul ston par byed pa'i bla ma /
analyzed: lhag ba lam zab mo tshhul ston ba byed ba bla ma

original: bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus kyi ngo bor mos pa'i gsol 'debs dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas zab mo'i dgongs pa skong ba la nam yang skyo dub med pa dang / lha dang bla ma dbyer med kyi bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug rig stong ye shes kyi 'khor lor nam yang 'du 'bral med pa nas /
analyzed: bde ba gshegs ba kun du kyi ngo bor mos ba gsol debs dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas zab mo dgongs ba skong ba la nam yang skyo dub med ba dang lha dang bla ma dbyer med kyi skyed rdzogs zung jug rig stong ye shes kyi khor lor nam yang du bral med ba nas

original: rang nyid gcig pu zhi bde'i blo spangs te mkha' mnyam gyi 'gro ba mtha' dag gtan bder 'god pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang de don sgrub pa gal che zhing /
analyzed: rang nyid gcig pu zhi bde blo spong te mkha mnyam gyi gro ba mtha dag gtan bder god ba bsam ba bzang po dang de don sgrub ba gal che zhing

original: ji ltar bsgos pa de dag nam du yang yal bar mi dor bar bsgrub bo snyam pa dang lus longs spyod mtha' dag man+dal du 'bul snyam pas 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
analyzed: ji ltar sgo ba de dag nam du yang yal ba mi dor ba sgrub bo snyam ba dang lus longs spyod mtha dag man+dal du bul snyam ba di rjes zlos mdzod

original: gtsho bos ji ltar bka' bstshal pa //
analyzed: gtsho bod ji ltar bka bstshal ba

original: sogs bya / des las can gsang lam btshan thabs su 'tshhang rgya ba'i gdams ngag bla ma sgrub pa'i dbang gi rim pa legs par /
analyzed: sogs byed des las can gsang lam btshan thabs su tshhang rgya ba doms ngag bla ma sgrub ba dbang gi rim ba legs ba

original: grub pa yin pas lha dang bla ma dbyer med kyi dkyil 'khor las mi 'da' ba'i ngang nas rang gzhan mkha' khyab kyi 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don rgya chen por 'bad par zhu /
analyzed: grub ba yin ba lha dang bla ma dbyer med kyi dkyil khor las mi da ba ngang nas rang gzhan mkha khyab kyi gro ba mtha dag gi don rgya chen por bad ba ju

original: zhes gdams shing bkra shis kyi tshhigs bcad brjod /
analyzed: zhes doms shing bkra shis kyi tshhigs gcod rjod

original: slob mas yon dang man+dal phul rjes mchod bstod dang tshhogs 'khor bya /
analyzed: slob mas yon dang man+dal bul rjes mchod bstod dang tshhogs khor byed

original: gter srung la gtor ma phul /
analyzed: gter srung la thor ma bul

original: bzod gsol gshegs bsdu bsngo smon bkra shis la sogs pas zhabs brgyan par bya'o //
analyzed: bzod gsol gshegs sdud sngo smon bkra shis la sogs ba zhabs rgyan ba byed

original: de ltar bla sgrub kyi dbang gi rim pa 'di ni sgam po pa dpal nor bu brgyan pas mdzad pa'i dbang chog ha cang bsdus drags pa blo ldan rnams la de tsham gyis go bar 'gyur na'ang /
analyzed: de ltar bla sgrub kyi dbang gi rim ba di ni sgam po ba dpal nor bu rgyan ba mdzad ba dbang chog ha cang sdud drag ba blo ldan rnams la de tsham gyis go ba gyur na

original: blo dman rnams ma rtogs log rtog phyogs rtogs kyi 'khrul pa mi ldang ba'i ched dang / nye lam dge ba'i bshes gnyen gung thang pa chos bzang dbang pos gcig tu brtshon pa'i bskul ma mdzad par brten /
analyzed: blo dman rnams ma rtogs log rtogs phyogs rtogs kyi khrul ba mi ldang ba ched dang nye lam dge ba bshes gnyen gung thang ba chos bzang dbang pos gcig tu brtshon ba skul ma mdzad ba rten
